template.s_title: {WEB_TITLE} - Iemand heeft een vraag over uw advertentie
template.s_description:
Hallo {CONTACT_NAME}!

{USER_NAME} ({USER_EMAIL}, {USER_PHONE}) heeft een bericht achter gelaten over advertentie {ITEM_TITLE}:

{COMMENT}

Vriendelijke groet,

{WEB_LINK}

Hallo {USER_NAME},

Valideer uw registratie door op de volgende link te klikken: {VALIDATION_LINK}

Bedankt!

Regards,

{WEB_LINK}

Hi {USER_NAME},

You've successfully registered for {WEB_LINK}.

Thank you!

Regards,

{WEB_LINK}

template.s_title: Kijk wat ik op gevonden heb op {WEB_TITLE}
template.s_description:
Hallo {FRIEND_NAME},

{USER_NAME} wil de volgend eadvertentie graag met u delen {ITEM_TITLE}.

Bericht:

{COMMENT}

Vriendelijke groet,

{WEB_TITLE}

template.s_title: {WEB_TITLE} - Nieuwe advertenties in the last hour
template.s_description:
Hallo {USER_NAME},

Nieuwe advertenties van het afgelopen uur. Klik hier om ze te bekijken:

{ADS}

-------------

Klik op de volgende link voor afmelding van deze alerts: {UNSUB_LINK}

{WEB_LINK}

template.s_title: {WEB_TITLE} - Nieuwe advertenties in the last day
template.s_description:
Hallo {USER_NAME},

Nieuwe advertenties van de afgelopen dag. Bekijk ze hier:

{ADS}

-------------

Klik op de volgende link om deze alerts niet meer te ontvangen: {UNSUB_LINK}

{WEB_LINK}

template.s_title: {WEB_TITLE} - Nieuwe advertenties in the last week
template.s_description:
Hallo {USER_NAME},

Nieuwe advertenties van de afgelopen week. Bekijk ze hier:

{ADS}

-------------

Klik op de volgende link indien u deze alerts niet meer wilt ontvangen: {UNSUB_LINK}

{WEB_LINK}

Hallo {USER_NAME},

Er is een nieuwe advertentie gepubliceerd, bekijk de advertentie!

{ADS}

-------------

Klik op de volgende link als u deze alerts niet meer wilt ontvangen: {UNSUB_LINK}

{WEB_LINK}

Someone commented on the listing {ITEM_TITLE}.

Commenter: {COMMENT_AUTHOR}
Commenter's email: {COMMENT_EMAIL}
Title: {COMMENT_TITLE}
Comment: {COMMENT_TEXT}

Hi {USER_NAME},

You're not registered at {WEB_LINK}, but you can still edit or delete the listing {ITEM_TITLE} for a short period of time.

You can edit your listing by following this link: {EDIT_LINK}

You can delete your listing by following this link: {DELETE_LINK}

If you register as a user, you will have full access to editing options.

Regards,

{WEB_LINK}

Hi {USER_NAME},

You're receiving this e-mail because a listing has been published at {WEB_LINK}. Please validate this listing by clicking on the following link: {VALIDATION_LINK}. If you didn't publish this listing, please ignore this email.

Listing details:

Contact name: {USER_NAME}
Contact e-mail: {USER_EMAIL}

{ITEM_DESCRIPTION}

Url: {ITEM_URL}

Regards,

{WEB_LINK}

template.s_title: {WEB_TITLE} - Er is een nieuwe advertentie gepubliceerd
template.s_description:
Dear {WEB_TITLE} admin,

You're receiving this email because a listing has been published at {WEB_LINK}.

Listing details:

Contact name: {USER_NAME}
Contact email: {USER_EMAIL}

{ITEM_DESCRIPTION}

Url: {ITEM_URL}

You can edit this listing by clicking on the following link: {EDIT_LINK}

Regards,

{WEB_LINK}

Hi {USER_NAME},

We've sent you this e-mail because you've requested a password reminder. Follow this link to recover it: {PASSWORD_LINK}

The link will be deactivated in 24 hours.

If you didn't request a password reminder, please ignore this message. This request was made from IP {IP_ADDRESS} on {DATE_TIME}

Regards,

{WEB_LINK}

Hi {USER_NAME}

You're receiving this e-mail because you requested an e-mail change. Please confirm this new e-mail address by clicking on the following validation link: {VALIDATION_LINK}

Regards,

{WEB_LINK}

Hallo {USER_NAME},

Valideer uw alert registratie door op de volgende link te klikken: {VALIDATION_LINK}

Bedankt!

Vriendelijke groet,

{WEB_LINK}

Hallo {COMMENT_AUTHOR},

Uw commentaar op {ITEM_TITLE} is goedgekeurd.

Groeten,

{WEB_LINK}

Hi {USER_NAME},

You're receiving this e-mail because you’ve published a listing at {WEB_LINK}. Please validate this listing by clicking on the following link: {VALIDATION_LINK}. If you didn't publish this listing, please ignore this e-mail.

Listing details:

Contact name: {USER_NAME}
Contact e-mail: {USER_EMAIL}

{ITEM_DESCRIPTION}

Url: {ITEM_URL}

Even if you're not registered at {WEB_LINK}, you can still edit or delete your listing:

You can edit your listing by following this link: {EDIT_LINK}

You can delete your listing by following this link: {DELETE_LINK}

Regards,

{WEB_LINK}

template.s_title: {WEB_TITLE} - Er is een nieuwe gebruiker aangemeld
template.s_description:
Dear {WEB_TITLE} admin,

You're receiving this email because a new user has been created at {WEB_LINK}.

User details:

Name: {USER_NAME}
E-mail: {USER_EMAIL}

Regards,

{WEB_LINK}

Hallo {CONTACT_NAME}!

{USER_NAME} ({USER_EMAIL}, {USER_PHONE}) heeft het volgende bericht achter gelaten:

{COMMENT}

Vriendelijke groet,

{WEB_LINK}

template.s_title: {WEB_TITLE} - Iemand heeft een reactie op uw advertentie
template.s_description:
There's a new comment on the listing: {ITEM_TITLE}.

Author: {COMMENT_AUTHOR}
Author's email: {COMMENT_EMAIL}
Title: {COMMENT_TITLE}
Comment: {COMMENT_TEXT}

{WEB_LINK}

Hallo {ADMIN_NAME},

De admin van {WEB_LINK} heeft met succes een account voor u,

  • Gebruikersnaam: {USERNAME}
  • Wachtwoord: {PASSWORD}

U kunt nu gebruik maken van het admin panneel hier {WEB_ADMIN_LINK}.

Hartelijk dank!!

gegroet,

template.s_title: {WEB_TITLE} - U advertentie staat op het punt af te lopen
template.s_description:
Hallo {USER_NAME},

U advertentie {ITEM_TITLE} staat op het punt af te lopen bij {WEB_LINK}.
